patthana13.20:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found.
patthana13.20:0.3_0: Next there are hands and feet, he deposited nymphs.
patthana13.20:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the arising of thought.
patthana13.20:2.1_0: (The Teaching should not be expanded externally.)
patthana13.20:3.1_0: (These two discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
